amendment.description: To limit the availability of funds for the Advanced Concepts Initiative of the National Nuclear Security Administration pending a report on activities under the initiative.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1710 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1710 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S11539-11544; text: CR S11541) To limit the availability of funds for the Advanced Concepts Initiative of the National Nuclear Security Administration pending a report on activities under the initiative.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1710 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1710 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Bingaman.
